description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Brisbane, Australia. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Grand Opening: Riverside Self-Contained Apartments in Brisbane's Newest Entertainment Complex
hotels.description: Set in the heart of Brisbane’s riverside precinct, these brand-new, spacious apartments are part of Queen’s Wharf, The Star Entertainment Group's brand-new A$3.6 billion entertainment precinct that's already redefining the city skyline. Just moments from Queen Street Mall and the South Bank cultural district, each apartment offers sweeping views of the river, city skyline, parklands or surrounding urban landscape. Start your day with a coffee by the river, stroll through the lush City Botanic Gardens or wander across the bridge to catch a performance at QPAC. Later, take a dip in the lap pool with panoramic city views, or retreat to your stylish apartment, complete with a fully equipped kitchen, laundry facilities and open-plan lounge and dining areas. With direct access to designer shopping, scenic riverside walks and Brisbane’s top dining destinations, this is your gateway to the city’s most exciting new precinct, where every stay is infused with energy, elegance and convenience.

hotels.title: Brisbane CBD Bliss near Eagle Street Pier
hotels.description: Make the most of your Brisbane escape when you stay close to the action at Holiday Inn Express Brisbane Central, an IHG Hotel. Spend days strolling along the nearby Brisbane River, or enjoy world-class dining at Eagle Street Pier waterfront (an easy four-minute drive away). During your downtime, enjoy meals at The Great Room restaurant and bar, or keep up with your fitness routine at the 24-hour gym with modern equipment available, including treadmills, a bicycle, free weights and yoga mats.

hotels.vendor_name: voco Brisbane City Centre, an IHG Hotel
hotels.title: Vibrant Inner-City Retreat Overlooking the Iconic Brisbane River
hotels.description: Experience the full BrisVegas lifestyle with a luxurious stayvoco Brisbane City Centre, an IHG Hotel ideally located with views over Brisbane River. This beautiful hotel will have you ready to experience the pumping nightlife and bustling streets lined with cafes and restaurants that Brisbane is famous for. Spend your days indulging in some retail therapy at the Queen Street Mall, then return for a fulfilling meal and well-deserved cocktail at the onsite cafe and lounge bar, Kraft & Co.

hotels.title: Stylish Novotel Brisbane South Bank Stay with Onsite Restaurant & Heated Pool
hotels.description: Experience a Brisbane city escape just a short walk from the cultural precinct and the riverside Streets Beach at this stylish stay. Here you are only a stone’s throw from the city's theatres, boutique shops, entertainment venues and a vibrant dining scene. Boasting a prime location on leafy Cordelia Street, close to the banks of the Brisbane River and the lush South Bank Parklands, this modern urban oasis takes you right into the city’s dynamic and cosmopolitan heart. When you’re ready to unwind, hit the hotel’s heated outdoor pool and don’t miss the onsite restaurant Spice Central Kitchen & Bar.

hotels.title: Modern Central Brisbane Apartment Stay near Brisbane River with Outdoor Pool & Sauna
hotels.description: Uncover a new side to Brisbane with a stay at this sleek retreat in the heart of the city centre. Located just a stone's throw from Brisbane's most popular sights including the lush Botanic Gardens, Queen Street Mall and vibrant South Bank precinct, Mantra on Mary Brisbane places you at the centre of all the action. When you're not exploring the sun-soaked city, return to the comfort of the hotel to float in the outdoor swimming pool, laze on the sun deck or enjoy a steamy detox in the sauna. As evening approaches, savour the freedom of a self-cooked meal at the onsite alfresco barbecue area.

hotels.title: Sophisticated Pullman Airport Stay within the Airport Precinct with Pool & Onsite Dining
hotels.description: Experience the modern elegance of Pullman, conveniently located in the heart of Brisbane's airport precinct. Dress-down and relax in comfortable rooms and head to the onsite Apron Restaurant & Bar to indulge in contemporary Australian cuisine. Refresh yourself with a dip in the outdoor swimming pool or laze on the pool deck while enjoying the breeze. For fitness enthusiasts, a state-of-the-art gym is available, while business travellers can take advantage of the well-equipped meeting rooms. This sleek hotel offers easy access to the city's bustling CBD, renowned for its eclectic mix of stylish boutiques, world-class restaurants and cultural attractions. The stunning Moreton Bay is just an hour away, offering an array of water sports and outdoor activities. Brisbane at its best awaits.

hotels.title: Sleek Apartment Escape near Brisbane CBD with Rooftop Pool
hotels.description: You couldn't ask for a more convenient location than The Milton Brisbane, positioned near some of the city's coolest bars, restaurants and breweries, minutes from the CBD. Onsite, you'll find a swimming pool, sauna and well-equipped gym, while self-contained apartments feature everything you need for a comfortable stay, including full kitchens and laundry facilities. Just below the hotel is a buzzing shopping and dining precinct, so you're never too far from a mouthwatering foodie experience.

hotels.title: Stylish Brisbane Riverside Escape within Hamilton Precinct
hotels.description: Discover the many charms of Queensland's capital city from the stylish View Brisbane - an urban retreat in the affluent precinct of Hamilton. Located between the city’s business and travel hubs, View Brisbane is ideally placed for shopping, sightseeing and exploring the array of bars, restaurants and sporting venues the city is so famous for. Check out the manmade beach at South Bank, stroll through the botanic gardens, take a day trip to the nearby Glass House Mountains or wine and dine at the trendy Howard Smith Wharves. With spacious rooms and panoramic Brisbane River views, memorable dining facilities and a large resort-style swimming pool with spa and sauna, this is the perfect choice for an ultra-cool city escape. And if it’s nightlife you're after, View Brisbane is only minutes from Fortitude Valley - the inner-city suburb that never sleeps.

hotels.title: Award-Winning Five-Star Brisbane South Bank Suite Escape with Rooftop Infinity Pool
hotels.description: Experience elevated luxury overlooking Brisbane River and watch the vibrant city lights from the rooftop infinity pool with a five-star stay at Emporium Hotel South Bank. Undeniably luxurious, with accolades including Australia’s Leading Boutique Hotel at the 2020 World Travel Awards and a Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice 2020 badge, this urban retreat delivers 'wow' factor from the moment you arrive. From the huge ‘E’ on the front of the building and the Instagram-worthy Terrace Rooftop Bar to a glistening 23m infinity pool adorned by lush palm trees and panoramic skyline views, this hotel is set to impress. High-end facilities include the award-winning Signature restaurant - a sophisticated space serving local, seasonal produce and an impeccably curated, 6,000-strong wine collection. Step off the streets of South Bank right onto a Parisian promenade at Belle Époque, a pastry café inspired by French finesse, then while away the evening in 1920s glamour with a stiff drink and smooth jazz at Piano Bar. Tranquil ambience and breathtaking views don’t even begin to cover the beauty inside every luxurious suite. Stylish and spacious, with each detail and handcrafted touch creating a sensory symphony bound to leave a lasting impression, suites boast the latest in-room automation, entertainment technology and premium amenities to create a one-of-a-kind urban sanctuary The crowning jewel of South Bank, overlooking glittering Brisbane River, mere moments from The Wheel of Brisbane, Kangaroo Point Lookout, Brisbane Convention & Exhibition Centre and Streets Beach - Australia’s only inner-city, manmade beach - Emporium Hotel South Bank also scores top points for location. Stroll along South Bank to Queensland Performing Arts Centre (QPAC), Queensland Art Gallery and Gallery of Modern Art, and Epicurious Garden. A short walk over the river takes you to Brisbane City Markets - make sure to stop by Gelato Messina en route for a scoop or two - Brisbane City Botanic Gardens, Old Government House and some of the city's best bars and restaurants.

hotels.title: Stylish Brisbane Mantra City Break in the Heart of the CBD with Outdoor Pool
hotels.description: With a prime position in Brisbane’s CBD - just minutes by foot from Queen Street Mall, Central Station and the city’s finest shops, restaurants and cafes - this stylish city break offers the perfect opportunity to fall in love with Queensland’s vibrant capital. After days spent exploring South Bank, the Gallery of Modern Art or Brisbane Botanic Gardens, retreat to the comfort of stylish rooms and apartments or visit the shimmering outdoor pool and laidback barbecue area, where you can cook up a laidback feast at your own pace.

hotels.vendor_name: Hotel X Brisbane Fortitude Valley, Vignette Collection, an IHG Hotel
hotels.title: Centrally Located Brisbane Fortitude Valley Escape with Rooftop Pool
hotels.description: Stay in the heart of Brisbane's cool Fortitude Valley at the uber-stylish Hotel X Brisbane Fortitude Valley, an IHG Hotel. Bask in that Queensland sunshine on sunloungers by the rooftop swimming pool, before sliding over to Iris Rooftop Bar & Restaurant for a Spanish tapas feast from a private cabana. Meanwhile, francophiles everywhere can enjoy a taste of France at Bisou Bisou, an upscale in-house bistro with a Parisienne menu and innovative cocktails.

hotels.title: Brisbane Eco-Friendly Modern Luxury on the Brisbane River with Rooftop Pool & Bar
hotels.description: Experience the vibrant energy of Brisbane's Howard Smith Wharves precinct at this stylish escape with a responsible luxury twist. This sustainable hotel boasts eclectic and vibrant decor, with over 500 prints by Australian artist Vincent Fantauzzo gracing the walls. Start your day at Mews for a hearty breakfast of traditional favourites, and spend your afternoon at Fiume rooftop pool and bar, offering some of the best concoctions to quench your thirst.

hotels.title: Self-Contained Brisbane Apartments Overlooking the Brisbane River with Pool, Spa & Sauna
hotels.description: Experience the high life at the stunning Oaks Brisbane on Felix Suites, a welcoming sanctuary in the heart of Brisbane's bustling CBD. This bright and modern stay offers unrivalled access to the city's finest attractions, from the iconic Story Bridge and the lush Botanic Gardens to the vibrant Queen Street Mall. Savour gastronomic delights at the acclaimed Eagle Street Pier, or retreat to your self-contained apartment for a homemade feast in the fully equipped kitchen. Relax with ease after exploring the vibrant city with a dip in the heated lap pool, a moment in the sauna, or a comfortable sit on the deck’s lounges with stunning views of the city.

hotels.title: Contemporary Central Brisbane Escape with Heated Lap Pool & Recreation Deck
hotels.description: Explore the vibrant heart of Queensland's capital city with a stay at this contemporary and centrally located hotel. Within walking distance of the city's best shopping at Queen Street Mall, the hotel offers easy access to the cultural delights of South Bank, including the Queensland Art Gallery and Gallery of Modern Art. Dine at the in-house Croft House, serving up fresh barista-made coffee and bistro-style dining in the evening, or take a dip in the heated outdoor pool. With a fully equipped fitness centre, a location that gives you access to Brisbane's most happening spots and spacious, contemporary rooms, The Sebel Brisbane is your home away from home in this dynamic city.

hotels.title: Stylish Brisbane Fortitude Valley Peppers City Break with Heated Skyline Pool
hotels.description: Escape in style to this modern urban oasis, perfectly located in the heart of Fortitude Valley, Brisbane’s funkiest entertainment hub, just moments from James Street. From its central location, explore a wealth of wonderful sights nearby, including The Tivoli and the lively local areas of Chinatown, Newstead and New Farm. FV Brisbane by Peppers has everything you need for a sensational city break - dive into the heated skyline pool, keep up your routine at the fully-equipped fitness centre, or smash your step count as you explore vibrant King Street. When it's time to retreat to your elegant room, indulge in a blend of signature Peppers luxury, upscale sophistication and inner-city living.

hotels.title: Modern Brisbane Self-Contained Apartments in City Centre with Pool, Sauna & Gym
hotels.description: Place yourself right in the heart of the action with a stylish and comfortable stay at Oaks Brisbane on Charlotte Suites. This contemporary retreat is a stone's throw from the city's iconic Queen Street Mall, offering a world of shopping, dining, and entertainment. After a day of urban exploration, retreat to your suite, a sanctuary of sophistication, and soak in the city views from your private balcony. Relax with ease with a dip in the lengthy lap pool, overlooking the city lights, or feel your stress slip away with a heart-racing workout in the gym.

hotels.title: Brisbane King George Square CBD Retreat with Rooftop Pool & Bar
hotels.description: Bask in the Brisbane sunshine at this modern hotel, ideally located in the heart of the city. This contemporary retreat is just a stone's throw from the city's best shopping precincts, including the Queen Street Mall and the Riverside Markets. After a day of exploring, retreat to the hotel's swanky rooftop for a refreshing dip in the pool and cocktails with city views, or enjoy a delicious Pacific-inspired Mediterranean meal at Goldfinch Restaurant. Venture further afield to the nearby South Bank Parklands, home to the Queensland Art Gallery and Gallery of Modern Art.

hotels.title: Sky-High Brisbane Stay with City Views
hotels.description: Experience city buzz from a tranquil location at the top-ranked Point Brisbane, a sleek boutique hotel nestled on the banks of the glistening Brisbane River. An exclusive inner-city village bound by water, the vibrant Kangaroo Point peninsula makes forgetting the world effortless. When you do want to discover the cosmopolitan CBD it's all within reach, with a complimentary ferry service running to the city every 30 minutes from 6am to midnight. There's no shortage of activity in this slice of city paradise either. Kangaroo Point Cliffs Park offers jungle-worthy treks, cycling, kayaking and abseiling, while Kangaroo Point Lookout affords mesmerising sunsets over the city's soaring skyline. The Gabba cricket ground is less than a 20-minute stroll and the iconic South Bank can be reached in around 40 minutes on foot. Tucked away on a tranquil peninsula within easy reach of Brisbane's CBD, The Point Brisbane feels more like a luxury oasis than an inner-city hotel. Top-tier facilities, such as the garden-framed swimming pool, the sophisticated Lamberts Restaurant and breathtaking rooftop Eagles Nest bar, are perfectly complemented by panoramic Brisbane vistas. Visit for yourself and discover why the hotel is ranked among the top 10 in the entire city on Tripadvisor and is stamped with a prestigious Travellers' Choice 2020 award.

hotels.title: Stylish Brisbane Stay in the Trendy North Quay Neighbourhood
hotels.description: Immerse yourself in the electric city buzz of Queensland's sun-kissed capital from the stylish Hotel Indigo Brisbane City Centre, an IHG Hotel - a modern oasis set within the artistic neighbourhood of North Quay. Savour traditional Japanese at Izakaya Publico, seductive cocktails at the speakeasy-inspired 1603 Bar or check out the modern gym. When it's time to explore, you'll find yourself just a stone's throw from the bustling hubs of South Bank, Fortitude Valley or James Street.

hotels.title: Contemporary Brisbane Stay in Leafy Upper Mount Gravatt
hotels.description: Nestled in Brisbane's green suburb of Upper Mount Gravatt, this contemporary hotel provides convenient access to the Westfield Garden City shopping centre and Griffith University’s Nathan Campus. Food enthusiasts will enjoy the nearby Eat Street Markets, while nature lovers can wander through Toohey Forest Conservation Park. After a day of exploring, savour local flavours at the on-site Distrikt Press cafe or relax in your room's well-equipped kitchenette, brewing a fresh cup of coffee as you plan your itinerary. The vibrant Brisbane CBD is just a 15-minute drive away, offering plenty of shopping, dining, and entertainment options. With the Gold Coast only an hour away, a beach getaway is always within easy reach.

hotels.title: Glamorous Neo-Georgian Hotel in Brisbane CBD with Martini Bar & Bistro
hotels.description: Experience the elegance of the 1920s with a stay at this neo-Georgian boutique hotel, located in the heart of Brisbane. Dine and drink at The Inchcolm Bar, serving classic local ingredient-led dishes and perfectly mixed martinis. When you're not exploring the nearby Fortitude Valley, retreat to your sophisticated suite, where art-deco design meets contemporary comfort.

hotels.title: Heritage-Listed Brisbane Art Deco Stay with Outdoor Pool
hotels.description: An impressive hotel located on George Street, the boutique Adina Apartment Hotel Brisbane is an artfully restored property awash with understated luxury. This is a truly relaxing stay in the heart of the city, rubbing elbows with some of Brisbane’s finest attractions, such as South Bank's Queensland Performing Arts Centre, Gallery of Modern Art, City Botanic Gardens and the local bars and restaurants of Eagle Street Pier, all within a stone's throw. After a day of exploration, enjoy the hotel's tasteful facilities, including a gymnasium and an outdoor swimming pool.

hotels.title: Boutique Retro-Inspired Brisbane Resort on Iconic James Street with Cabana-Fringed Pool Deck
hotels.description: The Calile Hotel promises effortless style within tropical modern surrounds, located within Brisbane’s vibrant James Street district. Providing a serene escape with feel-good vibes, the hotel celebrates the city’s climate, character and love for the outdoors. Enjoy lazy days and languorous nights in an easy and elevated setting with spacious guest rooms, poolside lounging, an array of restaurants and bars and boutique shopping. Dine across four of Brisbane’s finest restaurants - Hellenika, Lobby Bar, Sushi Room, and SK Steak & Oyster, energise with a cool drink poolside after an energetic session in our fitness centre or slow down at the in-house spa. With Brisbane’s celebrated art galleries, museums, and CBD all a short drive away, the Calile is your companion for a truly memorable stay.

hotels.vendor_name: Adina Apartment Hotel Brisbane Anzac Square
hotels.title: Sophisticated Brisbane Adina Stay near Queen Street Mall
hotels.description: Immerse yourself in the heritage sophistication of Adina Apartment Hotel Brisbane Anzac Square and base yourself in the heart of Queensland's capital. Overlooking Anzac Square memorial gardens and directly opposite Central Railway Station, this style property offers spacious serviced apartments in the heart of the city. After busy days exploring Brisbane, retreat to your very own stylish studio or apartment, each fitted with a kitchenette to feel right at home.

hotels.title: Quintessential Pullman Luxury in Brisbane CBD with Onsite Dining, Rooftop Pool & Bar
hotels.description: Stay at this perfectly positioned Pullman property in the bustling Brisbane CBD. This modern hotel is a stone's throw from the bustling Queen Street Mall, South Bank, Roma Street Parklands and the lush City Botanic Gardens. With elegantly appointed rooms and a rooftop pool, guests enjoy top-tier amenities. Savour a drink at the chic Sixteen Antlers Rooftop Bar, or dine on locally-sourced fare at the stylish Goldfinch Restaurant. With a state-of-the-art fitness centre and an outdoor pool, this is the perfect base to explore Brisbane's rich cultural scene and culinary delights.

hotels.title: Brisbane Riverside Stay in the Heart of South Bank
hotels.description: Feel the pulse of Brisbane’s CBD with a stay that’s simultaneously serene and perfectly positioned to discover the action at Rydges South Bank Brisbane. From this central location, you can explore Brisbane like a true local - before returning to signature Rydges comfort with a swimming pool, sauna and regional dining at your fingertips. Stroll through the 17-hectare South Bank Parklands precinct, take a dip in Streets Beach's man-made lagoon, drop into the nearby Brisbane Convention & Exhibition Centre and State Library of Queensland, then cross the Brisbane River and meander through Queen Street Mall. In the evening, discover one of the city's hip rooftops, intimate wine bars, gin distilleries or whisky dens.

hotels.title: French-Inspired Sofitel Brisbane Escape with Rooftop Swimming Pool & Fine Dining Restaurant
hotels.description: Experience a touch of French sophistication in Queensland's sun-soaked capital with a stay at this très elegant Sofitel escape - a five-star urban retreat and the crown jewel of the city's glistening skyline. Effortlessly blending Sofitel’s renowned style with the cool vibes of Brisbane, and boasting exquisite facilities including two outstanding restaurants and a luxurious day spa, this high-end hotel offers opulence in one of the most esteemed locations in the city. Towering above prestigious Turbot Street, in the heart of the CBD and moments from the banks of the Brisbane River, the best of Brisbane is on your doorstep. Visit the Gallery of Modern Art, enjoy a short stroll to Brisbane's iconic South Bank, splash in the man-made sandy beach lagoon, explore the weekend markets or dine at some of the city's best restaurants.

hotels.title: Luxury InterContinental Brisbane CBD Stay Moments from Queen Street with Outdoor Pool
hotels.description: Luxury you know and love awaits in the heart of Queensland’s vibrant capital at this five-star InterContinental retreat, ideally located near Brisbane’s iconic Queen Street Mall. This hotel is the perfect base for exploring the city’s rich cultural and entertainment offerings, from the renowned Gallery of Modern Art to the scenic South Bank Parklands. Savour delicious cuisine at the hotel’s onsite restaurant, or unwind with a glass of wine or cocktail in the chic lounge. For those seeking relaxation, the heated outdoor pool and fitness centre provide the perfect recharge. From this coveted CBD location, the very best of Brisbane is right at your doorstep.

hotels.title: Vibrant Hyatt Regency Retreat in the Heart of Brisbane with Restaurant, Rooftop Bar & Infinity Pool
hotels.description: Experience the cosmopolitan charm of Queensland’s capital with a cocktail in hand at this five-star haven. Nestled in the heart of the CBD, the hotel’s standout is its stunning 20-metre outdoor infinity pool and the poolside Hibiscus Bar & Terrace. Take a refreshing morning dip or unwind in the evening with a handcrafted tipple while overlooking the cityscape and enjoying Brisbane’s balmy climate. Whether you’re in Brisbane for a weekend of shopping, riverfront dining or bar-hopping in Fortitude Valley, this inner-city haven is perfectly located next to Queen Street Mall and close to the city’s best shopping, dining and entertainment options. Enjoy everything this vibrant city has to offer with a stay at this central Brisbane escape.

hotels.title: Contemporary Brisbane Airport Stay with Onsite Restaurant & Bar
hotels.description: Boasting a convenient location just 10 minutes from the domestic and international terminals, this Brisbane Airport stay is the pinnacle of comfort and elegance. Soothe your muscles in the sauna, or stay on top of your workout game in the state-of-the-art fitness centre. Dine on modern Australian plates at the onsite Catalina Bar & Restaurant, or use Novotel Brisbane Airport as your base to explore Brisbane's best. Check out casual dining spots at Eat Street Northshore or trendy eateries at Howard Smith Wharves. And if you're craving sun and surf, the legendary Gold Coast beaches are just a quick drive away.

hotels.title: Contemporary Central Brisbane Escape in Spring Hill with Onsite Restaurant & Outdoor Pool
hotels.description: Discover the vibrant pulse of Queensland's sun-kissed capital city from this centrally located urban oasis, perfectly positioned in Spring Hill, close to the banks of the Brisbane River. Overlooking the lush, designer gardens of Roma Street Parklands, this stylish retreat offers unparalleled access to the city's cultural hotspots, award-winning restaurants and trendy boutiques. After a day of exploration, return to your hotel to savour delectable Italian delights at Osteria Roma - the onsite bakery, restaurant and bar serving fresh breakfast, tasty juices and refreshing cocktails. If you're looking to cool off, enjoy a refreshing swim in the outdoor pool before heading to the onsite fitness center to make the most of your city break.

hotels.title: Stylish Brisbane Break near Fortitude Valley with Espresso Bar
hotels.description: Slip into the stylish suburb of Spring Hill on the leafy outskirts of Fortitude Valley with a stay at Kennigo Hotel Brisbane, your ultimate base to explore the city's uber-trendy bars, incredible foodie scene, and live music venues. Before setting off to explore each day, pay a visit to the onsite Kennigo Espresso Bar for a specialty coffee blend and tasty brunch. Go shopping for Australian labels along James Street, find your next great feed along Brunswick Street, or see a live show at the Judith Wright Centre. Then, return to the comforts of this cosmopolitan, hotel decked out in Industrial-cool style.

hotels.title: Contemporary Brisbane Self-Contained Apartment Escape in the Heart of the CBD
hotels.description: Discover the Queensland capital at your leisure from the perfect launchpad - the stylish apartments at Oaks Brisbane Aurora Suites, right in the heart of Brisbane's bustling and vibrant CBD. Ideally located for urban adventures, these contemporary, self-contained apartments offer stunning city or river views steps from Brisbane’s best sights. Queen Street Mall is a just a ten-minute walk away, while the unmissable eateries of South Bank can be reached within a 10-minute drive. When you're ready to step away from the cosmopolitan buzz of Brisbane, retreat to your modern accommodation and take a dip in the 25-metre lap pool, relax in the jacuzzi or work up a sweat in the fitness centre.

hotels.title: Award-Winning Brisbane Ovolo Designer Escape in the Heart of Fortitude Valley
hotels.description: Fall in love with one of Australia’s most exciting suburbs during an escape at the award-winning Ovolo The Valley - a design-seeker's wonderland, inspired by the creative and cultural fabric of Brisbane's Fortitude Valley. Perfectly placed amid an eclectic mix of the city’s hottest restaurants, bars and boutiques, this sophisticated abode puts the delights of this happening inner-city suburb at your fingertips. As you step inside the lobby, it’s hard to look past the striking maximalist interior; the carefully selected contemporary artworks matched with luxurious design make it clear that Ovolo properties are in a league of their own. The quirky communal spaces encourage rest and relaxation, before extending to its stylish rooms and suites, offering quirky contemporary artwork and luxurious designs, perfect for the modern traveller. The rooftop pool and 24-hour gym are heaven for those who like to keep active, while the hotel’s onsite eateries, ZA ZA TA and KAZBA, offer innovative Mediterranean and Middle Eastern cuisine, with menus inspired by the centuries-old flavours and buzzing boulevards of Tel Aviv. Beloved for its effortless high-tech touches, personal service, artsy interiors and ideal location, it's easy to see why Ovolo The Valley - a place to be seen in Brisbane - was named among the Top 25 Hotels in Australia at the 2021 Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice awards.

hotels.title: Contemporary Central Brisbane Apartments Near Kings Park & Botanic Gardens
hotels.description: Experience the high-octane glamour of Queensland's capital from Oaks Brisbane Casino Tower Suites, a family-friendly haven boasting a coveted location in the city's CBD. This comfortable retreat offers unparalleled access to the city's vibrant nightlife, award-winning restaurants, and the iconic South Bank Parklands. Indulge in the thrill of the nearby Treasury Casino, savour world-class cuisine at the acclaimed Eagle Street Pier, or simply make use of the hotel's glittering 25-metre lap pool.

hotels.title: Boutique Brisbane Art Series Retreat in Spring Hill with Outdoor Pool & Sundeck
hotels.description: Splash into Brisbane’s colourful scene with a bold Art Series stay that combines elegant comforts with cosmopolitan flair. Fringing the lively CBD, the hotel's design is inspired by renowned Australian abstract artist Michael Johnson. Refresh from Brisbane's sunny days with a dip in the outdoor pool designed by Olympic swimmer Michael Klim or gaze at the cityscape from the sundeck. From this luxe launchpad, discover the award-winning eateries and historic pubs in Spring Hill or wander to the Roma Street Parkland. Just moments away, explore the bustling Queen Street Mall, or dare to delve deeper into Queensland’s art and culture offerings with Fortitude Valley’s trendy nightlife or South Bank’s best galleries, all accessible in under 10 minutes.

seo.title: Hotel a Brisbane - Australia Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
